archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Microsoft Forms
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Microsoft Forms is a simple, user-friendly tool by Microsoft that allows users to create surveys, quizzes, and polls. Integrated with other Microsoft 365 services, it facilitates collecting feedback, assessing knowledge, or gathering data, presenting results in real-time analytics, and exporting responses to other applications like Excel. Its intuitive design and integration capabilities make it suitable for education, business, and various collaborative scenarios.
